title: X Factor Celebrity: Vinnie Jones will perform Blues Brothers
text:
Vinnie Jones and No Love Lost will be taking to the stage tonight (Picture: ITV)

The X Factor: Celebrity will be launching its first live show on Saturday and the song choices of its finalists have been revealed, with Vinnie Jones tackling an uplifting Blues Brothers classic in memory of his late wife and the Love Island super group No Love Lost unexpectedly performing an original song.

Former football star Jones joins the show as a last-minute addition following the tragic death of his wife Tanya.

The X-Men actor has announced he will be performing some of his wife’s favourite songs in the live shows, so get the tissues at the ready,

The true surprise of the lot is No Love Lost – made up of former Islanders Samira Mighty, Eyal Booker, Zara McDermott and Wes Nelson – will be performing an original song.

Let’s hope their composition is more Bleeding Love than Chico Time.

No Love Lost’s original song will hopefully be more Bleeding Love than Chico Time (Picture: PA)

The 13 finalists also include The Chase star Jenny Ryan, who returns to The X Factor stage after being sensationally axed from the show last week by Nicole Scherzinger and Essex’s answer to Dolly Parton, Megan McKenna, who will also be performing another original composition this week.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The contestants are performing an eclectic choice of songs this week.

From current hits such as Billie Eilish’s Bad Guy and Lizzo’s Good As Hell, to dance-floor classic Show Me Love by Robin S and weepy favourite Landslide by Fleetwood Mac.

We’re also living in 2019, so of course we get to see Try Star (made up of rugby players Ben Foden, Thom Evans and Levi Davis) are going full-on Glee and mashing Ginuwine’s sex anthem Pony with Lil Nas X’s viral smash Old Town Road, because why not.

Speaking of Try Star, there are rumours that their performance tonight could be the ‘raunchiest’ in the show’s history.

The full list of the songs being performed by The X Factor: Celebrity contestants GROUPS Try Star – Pony by Ginuwine / Old Town Road by Lil Nas X V5- Bad Guy by Billie Elish / Taki Taki by DJ Snake, Ozuna, Cardi B and Selena Gomez Max and Harvey – When Will I Be Famous by Bros No Love Lost – All Or Nothing (Original Song) OVERS Ricki Lake- Landslide by Fleetwood Mac Jenny Ryan – Rise Like A Phoenix by Conchita Wurst Victoria Ekanoye – Never Tear Us Apart by INXS Vinnie Jones – Everybody Needs Somebody by The Blues Brothers Martin Bashir– Danke Schoen by Wayne Newton. UNDERS Megan McKenna – This (Original Song) Olivia Olson – Anyone Who Had A Heart by Dionne Warwick Jonny Labey – Show Me Love by Robin S Kevin McHale – Good as Hell by Lizzo

The X Factor: Celebrity airs tonight at 8.35pm on ITV.

description: There will be a Love Island original song and a Vinnie Jones cover of Blues Brothers in the first live X Factor: Celebrity show.
